column5: Cheaper than most of your lures.  http://www.banggood.com/Portable-Pocket-Pen-Shape-Aluminum-Alloy-Fishing-Rod-Pole-Reel-Combos-p-76315.html?utm_source=facebook&utm_medium=facebook_cpc&utm_campaign=Flshing_pole_desktop_new&utm_content=vivian&utm_design=03
Hahaha, I had one of those.  I used to play with the cat with it, until it broke!
That with a banjo minnow would be a killer
Dang and I broke the bank on new rods at the spring fishing show wish I had seen that before I could have loaded up
haha i have one of those
Lol I have one.. hey, it fits in your coat pocket.. something is better than nothing!

That thing seems like an ideal product to take down south on a beach vacation. I know I could have and would have used one when I was in Cuba a couple of weeks ago! I could see me catching little reef fish with that all day long... sure would beat the boredom of just sitting on the beach watching the world go by...  HH
